translations: adv.掉以轻心地；不加注意地

phrs.translation: 粗心大意地, 不注意地

sentences.sentence: This is how a disciple of the noble ones lives heedlessly.
sentences.translation: 难陀！如是之圣弟子，住于放逸。

sentences.sentence: If you heedlessly damage your virtue, you bring shame and disgrace to your parents.
sentences.translation: 品德如有缺失，会带给父母亲羞辱。

sentences.sentence: If you heedlessly damage your virtue, you bring shame and disgrace to your parents.
sentences.translation: 德有伤，贻亲羞。品德如有缺失，会带给父母亲羞辱。
